skills.skill: Cross-platform/Native iOS and Android Application development
Web technologies AngularJs, Angular, NodeJs, Ionic Framework and adjacent technologies such as Node and Webpack
Experience working with remote data via JSON and XML format and REST and SOAP APIs
Web development experience which includes the programming/ development of web applications.
Strong Experience with Java/J2EE, Spring MVC, Hibernate, EJB, Spring
Design, code, test, and deploy J2EE based applications into industry-leading container/application server environments such as Websphere/Weblogic/JBos
Knowledge of any Web technologies like AngularJs, Angular, React, NodeJs and Ionic Framework
Designing and implementing web applications using J2EE, Spring, Spring MVC, Flex, Hibernate, EJB 3.0, Struts, Oracle 12g, ANT, Maven, workflow engines
Experience developing mobile apps using cloud platforms
Experience with API, SOAP/RESTful Web Services, GraphQL, usage in the Mobile Applications
Deep technical knowledge of iOS and Android platforms, cloud message APIs and push notifications
Experience with source code control, build, and release management
Continuous learner, takes initiative, and understands what it takes to get outstanding customer satisfaction.

duties_responsibilities.duty: Design, develop, modify, deploy, and support custom mobile applications for iOS and Android using the Ionic platform.
Work closely with architects, Sr. developers, managers, executives, and other groups throughout the development process.
Establish coding standards, code reviews, architecture of the Mobile Application Development.
Grow and support constituent facing mobile and web applications to streamline client experience.
Perform benchmark testing, as well as debugging and documentation of programs, code, and data flow.
Implement and support top programming practices and standards to deliver quality products predictably and consistently.
Execute and craft technical documentation of newly implemented features and bug fixes.
Ability to think through and articulate complex problems and solutions.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's degree in computer science/Engineering or a related area from an accredited college or university
